zwave\/fibaro.fgr222_-_Volets.md.Le micromodule FGR-222 va vous permettre: The FGR-222 micromodule will allow you to manage shutter motors with electronic stop, Venetian blinds or even garage doors thanks to the Z-Wave protocol while keeping your existing switch
zwave\/fibaro.fgr222_-_Volets.md.Vous allez donc pouvoir actionner le mot: You will therefore be able to operate the connected motor using the existing switch, a Z-Wave transmitter or directly from the button on the micromodule
zwave\/fibaro.fgr222_-_Volets.md.De plus, ce micromodule est capable de t: In addition, this micromodule is able to transmit the instantaneous (W) and cumulative (KWh) electricity consumption of the equipment attached to it
zwave\/fibaro.fgr222_-_Volets.md.Un contrôleur Z-Wave (télécommande, dong: A Z-Wave controller (remote control, dongle, etc.) is required to integrate this module into your network if you already have an existing network
zwave\/fibaro.fgr222_-_Volets.md.Chaque module Z-Wave fonctionne comme un: Each Z-Wave module works as a wireless repeater with the other modules, to ensure total coverage of your home
zwave\/fibaro.fgr222_-_Volets.md.Ce module nécessite le neutre pour fonct: This module requires the neutral to operate
zwave\/fibaro.fgr222_-_Volets.md.Commandez vos stores ou volets roulants: Control your blinds or roller shutters remotely
zwave\/fibaro.fgr222_-_Volets.md.Compatible avec BSO et store vénitien av: Compatible with BSO and Venetian blind with slat positioning
zwave\/fibaro.fgr222_-_Volets.md.Compatible avec les moteurs à butée méca: Compatible with motors with mechanical or electronic stop
zwave\/fibaro.fgr222_-_Volets.md.Mesure de la consommation instantanée et: Measurement of instantaneous and cumulative consumption

zwave\/greenwave.Powernode1_-_Prise.md.Le module prise PowerNode de GreenWave e: The GreenWave PowerNode socket module is a smart device that connects to one of your household appliances and electronics to allow you to monitor and control power consumption remotely via a web browser or smartphone

zwave\/greenwave.powernode_-_Multiprise..La multiprise PowerNode de GreenWave est: GreenWave's PowerNode power strip is a smart device that connects to your home appliances and electronics to allow you to monitor and control the power consumption of your appliances remotely via a web browser or smartphone

zwave\/greenwave.powernode_-_Multiprise..Une petite molette sur le côté de la mul: A small wheel on the side of the power strip allows you to choose a color that will represent the room to which the power strip is assigned

zwave\/mco.MH-S412_Double_-_Interrupteur.L'interrupteur MH-S412-EU permet de comm: The MH-S412-EU switch allows the 2 connected loads to be switched, either manually like a conventional switch, or remotely via the Z-Wave wireless protocol

the touch buttons have an orange colored halo when the load is not driven

zwave\/mco.MH-S412_Double_-_Interrupteur.Pour exclure ce modèle, mettre Openzwave: To exclude this model, put Openzwave in exclusion mode and press only one of the 2 buttons on the front panel for 3 seconds, in accordance with its paper documentation

zwave\/smart_Home_by_Everspring.AN179-0_.À des fins de sécurité, l'unité peut dét: For safety purposes, the unit can detect overheating and will directly turn off the relay to prevent damage
zwave\/smart_Home_by_Everspring.AN179-0_.À une tension de 230 V, ce module peut s: At a voltage of 230 V, this module can support up to 11 A in resistive load, 1200 Watts incandescent, 700 Watts of motor, or 320 Watts (8 x 40 Watts) of fluorescent load
zwave\/smart_Home_by_Everspring.AN179-0_.Le Micromodule Mural ON\/OFF est un appa: The ON/OFF Wall Micromodule is a Z-Wave™ compatible device that is intended to work with all Z-Wave™ compatible networks
zwave\/smart_Home_by_Everspring.AN179-0_.Il peut être contrôlé par une télécomman: It can be controlled by remote control, PC software, or any Z-Wave controller on your network
zwave\/smart_Home_by_Everspring.AN179-0_.S'installe facilement dans une boîte d'e: Easily installs in a standard backbox
zwave\/smart_Home_by_Everspring.AN179-0_.jusqu'à 70 m à l'extérieur, jusqu'à 30 m: up to 70 m outdoors, up to 30 m indoors
zwave\/smart_Home_by_Everspring.AN179-0_.Pour configurer le plugin OpenZwave et s: To configure the OpenZwave plugin and know how to include Jeedom refer to this
zwave\/smart_Home_by_Everspring.AN179-0_.Pour mettre ce module en mode inclusion: To put this module in inclusion mode, you must press its button 3 times, in accordance with its paper documentation
zwave\/smart_Home_by_Everspring.AN179-0_.Il est important de noter que ce module: It is important to note that this module goes directly into inclusion when it does not belong to any network and is powered
zwave\/smart_Home_by_Everspring.AN179-0_.Une fois inclus vous devriez obtenir cec: Once included you should get this
zwave\/smart_Home_by_Everspring.AN179-0_.Une fois le module reconnu, les commande: Once the module is recognized, the commands associated with the module will be available
zwave\/smart_Home_by_Everspring.AN179-0_.Voici la liste des commandes: Here is the list of commands
zwave\/smart_Home_by_Everspring.AN179-0_.C'est la commande qui permet d'allumer l: This is the command that turns on the light
zwave\/smart_Home_by_Everspring.AN179-0_.C'est la commande qui permet d'éteindre: This is the command that turns off the light
zwave\/smart_Home_by_Everspring.AN179-0_.C'est la commande qui permet de connaitr: This is the command that allows you to know the status of the light
zwave\/smart_Home_by_Everspring.AN179-0_.A noter que sur le dashboard, les infos: Note that on the dashboard, the Status, ON/OFF information is found on the same icon
zwave\/smart_Home_by_Everspring.AN179-0_.Vous pouvez effectuer la configuration d: You can configure the module according to your installation
zwave\/smart_Home_by_Everspring.AN179-0_.Il faut pour cela passer par le bouton \: To do this, you must go through the "Configuration" button of the OpenZwave plugin from Jeedom
zwave\/smart_Home_by_Everspring.AN179-0_.Vous arriverez sur cette page (après avo: You will arrive on this page (after clicking on the settings tab
zwave\/smart_Home_by_Everspring.AN179-0_.Ce paramètre déﬁnit la commande de valeu: This parameter deﬁnes the status value command, it is not advisable to change this value
zwave\/smart_Home_by_Everspring.AN179-0_.Ce paramètre définit le délai d'envoi du: This parameter defines the delay for sending the status change to group 1 (value between 3 and 25 seconds
zwave\/smart_Home_by_Everspring.AN179-0_.Ce paramètre permet de définir si l'inte: This parameter is used to define whether the switch will resume its status (ON or OFF) after a power recovery
zwave\/smart_Home_by_Everspring.AN179-0_.Ce paramètre permet de définir le type d: This parameter is used to define the type of switch (push-button/bistable
zwave\/smart_Home_by_Everspring.AN179-0_.A minima Jeedom devrait se retrouver dan: At least Jeedom should end up in group 1
zwave\/smart_Home_by_Everspring.AN179-0_.Le retour d'état ne peut pas être config: Status feedback cannot be configured under 3 seconds
zwave\/smart_Home_by_Everspring.AN179-0_.Pas de notion de wake up sur ce module: No concept of wake up on this module

zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.SwiidInter est le premier interrupteur s: SwiidInter is the first on-cord switch in the Z-Wave home automation environment that is small and discreet enough to be comparable to an ordinary on-cord switch
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.Il peut être utilisé à la fois manuellem: It can be operated both manually like any regular corded switch and remotely via a Z-Wave controller
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.L'interrupteur SwiidInter offre égalemen: The SwiidInter switch also offers two-way association possibilities
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.Ainsi, il peut être actionné automatique: Thus, it can be activated automatically by another Z-Wave device in the same network, such as by the triggering of a presence detector
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.Inversement avec un appui court ou avec: Conversely, with a short press or with a long press, it can control two separate groups of Z-Wave devices that have been associated with it

zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.L'interrupteur SwiidInter s'installe exa: The SwiidInter switch installs just like a regular cord switch
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.c'est donc une installation simple et ra: it is therefore a simple and quick installation that does not require any specialized tools
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.Il doit ensuite être configuré pour s'in: It must then be configured to integrate into a Z-Wave "network", this network can be as simple as a single remote control which controls your SwiidInter switch remotely
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.Interrupteur sur cordon utilisable à la: Cord switch usable both manually (short press) and by remote radio (Z-Wave
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.Utilisation en remplacement d'un interru: Use as a replacement for a standard cord switch on a bedside, table or desk lamp
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.Activation d'un scénario domotique sur a: Activation of a home automation scenario on a long press (Z-Wave association
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.Dimensions comparables à un interrupteur: Dimensions comparable to an ordinary cord switch
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.S'installe comme un interrupteur sur cor: Installs like a regular cord switch
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.Convient pour tous types d'ampoules de l: Suitable for all types of lamp bulbs
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.Pour configurer le plugin OpenZwave et s: To configure the OpenZwave plugin and know how to include Jeedom refer to this
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.Pour mettre ce module en mode inclusion: To put this module in inclusion mode, you must press the button on the back, in accordance with its paper documentation
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.Une fois inclus vous devriez obtenir cec: Once included you should get this
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.Une fois le module reconnu, les commande: Once the module is recognized, the commands associated with the module will be available
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.Voici la liste des commandes: Here is the list of commands
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.C'est la commande qui permet de connaîtr: This is the command that lets you know the status of the light
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.C'est la commande qui permet d'allumer l: This is the command that turns on the light
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.C'est la commande qui permet d'éteindre: This is the command that turns off the light
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.A noter que sur le dashboard toutes les: Note that on the dashboard all the information is found on the same icon
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.Vous pouvez effectuer la configuration d: You can configure the module according to your installation
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.Il faut pour cela passer par le bouton \: To do this, you must go through the "Configuration" button of the OpenZwave plugin from Jeedom
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.Vous arriverez sur cette page (après avo: You will arrive on this page (after clicking on the settings tab
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.Ce paramètre permet de choisir le compor: This parameter allows you to choose the behavior when you associate the swiidinter with another module (long press
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.n'aura aucun effet sur les autres lumièr: will have no effect on other lights
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.sera effectif uniquement pour éteindre l: will be effective only to turn off the other lights
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.sera effectif uniquement pour allumer le: will be effective only to turn on the other lights
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.sera effectif pour allumer et éteindre l: will be effective to turn on and off the other lights
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.Ce module possède deux groupes d'associa: This module has two association groups
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.Pour un fonctionnement optimum de votre: For optimum operation of your module

zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.Pour associer le swiidinter à une autre: To associate the swiidinter with another light and be able to benefit from the switching on of another light, simply add it to association group 1 via the screen mentioned above
zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.Pas de notion de wake up sur ce module: No concept of wake up on this module

zwave\/template_inclusion.md.Il faut maintenant inclure le module, po: It is now necessary to include the module, for that, it is necessary to go in the menu "Plugins", "Protocol Domotics" then "Z-Wave

zwave\/template_inclusion.md.Après avoir cliqué sur \" Mode inclusion: After clicking on "Inclusion mode", a message appears to remind you that you are in this mode

zwave\/template_installationzwave.md.Si vous n'en disposez pas encore, il va: If you don't have one yet, you will need to install the Z-Wave plugin, don't worry, it only takes a few seconds

zwave\/template_installationzwave.md.Enfin, cliquez sur le bouton \" Market \: Finally, click on the "Market" button located at the top left
zwave\/template_installationzwave.md.Une fois sur le Market, dans la barre de: Once on the Market, in the search bar at the top right, type the word Z-wave and validate with the enter key
zwave\/template_installationzwave.md.Sélectionnez le plugin et installez le: Select the plugin and install it
zwave\/template_installationzwave.md.Ensuite, il suffit de l'activer en cliqu: Then, just activate it by clicking on the "activate" button that appears
zwave\/template_installationzwave.md.Une fois le plugin activé, vous avez acc: Once the plugin is activated, you have access to its configuration
zwave\/template_installationzwave.md.Si vous utilisez une box Jeedom Officiel: If you are using an Official Jeedom box (Mini, Mini+) please do not touch the configuration, however you can enter a name in the "Z-wave server name" field (here Jeebox), same thing if you are on a DIY installation but without remote mode
zwave\/template_installationzwave.md.Dans le cas contraire, la configuration: Otherwise, the configuration will have to be adapted according to your type of installation (Remote mode, Openzwave, etc.)
